items.sentence: I can't recall the last time I watched a basketball game.
Tom found the book he'd been looking for for a long time.
The taxi driver blamed the accident. on the truck driver.
Tom said that he thought that he had forgotten something.
Tom, who had been working all day, wanted to have a rest.
I understand Tom salted away a good deal for his old age.
If you don't care for Tom, don't toy with his affections.
They declined Tom's invitation as politely as they could.
Tom's life is insured for three hundred thousand dollars.
Tom realized right away he should've worn a heavier coat.
